review: I bought the Fire TV more because I was already a Prime member and wanted to take full advantage of my membership than any other reason. I refuse to run up a bill watching paid shows (cable is already screwing me sufficiently, thank you), so I stick to the Prime Video which is included in my Prime membership.I'm currently watching the first season of Bosch (an Amazon exclusive series). It's excellent and I'm hoping for a second season.One note - I also have an Amazon Echo. It uses the same remote control as the Fire TV, but the Echo's remote came with a magnetic holder - my Fire TV's remote didn't. I really like the holder, so I use it for the Fire TV's remote (I really don't use the Echo's remote). I think the Fire TV should include the magnetic holder also.
author: Grady Richardson

review: Works great with Sling TV! This is my primary source of entertainment when I just want to turn something on and relax. I had the Fire Stick and kept having issues with it buffering on Sling TV. Not with the Fire TV! Cable cutting has never been easier!
